# execute /spiffs/commands.txt
#F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:84
#F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:E4
#F0:9E:9E:21:E2:70

loop 2
motor 1300 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000  5000 F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:E4
hold 5500
motor 1000 1300 1000 1000 1000 1000  5000 F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:E4
hold 5500
motor 1000 1000 1300 1000 1000 1000  5000 F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:E4
hold 5500
motor 1000 1000 1000 1300 1000 1000  5000 F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:E4
hold 5500
motor 1000 1000 1000 1000 1300 1000  5000 F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:E4
hold 5500
motor 1000 1000 1000 1000 1000 1300 5000 F0:9E:9E:1E:4A:E4
hold 5500
end
